data.text: @Erin49307189 @kellyortagua I believe POTUS really wants to help and will. I know not much about your plight but I know justice and mercy must be joined together. Prayers and tweets help
@kellyortagua It hurts my heart that my brother will do more time than a child molester or a killer or a terrorist. For something that was a non violent first time offence

@realDonaldTrump @POTUS @BarackObama @Oprah @MeekMill @Nas @BET @BETMusic @kanyewest @KimKardashian @LilKim @LilTunechi @LilJon @RickRoss @FLGovScott @SnoopDogg help me be heard help stop #mandatorysentencing help me save my family and so many others this is what's important

I'm lost and dont know what to do, to save my family. I have to keep going tho,I will have to be without my husband for God only knows how long..What do I tell my son,how will I ever explain what this system is doing to his Father,hes only 8 and may not see him again until 19 ???
